title: Tsukumodou Kottouten - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Mystery   Romance   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Antique Shop   Artifacts   Average-looking Protagonist   Conditional Power   Eye Powers   Interconnected Storylines   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Seeing Things Other Humans Can't   Store Owner   Unreliable Narrator
author: Odou Akihiko
description:
In our world there are objects that go by the name of 'Relics'. Not antiques or items of classical art, but mysterious things like a stone that brings luck, a doll whose hair grows night after night, or a mirror that shows your future appearance.

The world is big and so there happens to be a shop that offers such suspicious items â€” the Tsukumodo Antique Shop (FAKE). But as the name suggests, only fakes can be found there. To make matters worse, the shop assistant is a girl whose attendance couldn't be blunter, so the store hardly has any customers at all. However, from time to time a real Relic appears and makes things interesting.

Very well, now let us talk about those who have obtained one of these mysterious items.>
